title: CryptoGirl7
author: CryptoGirl7
content: iBanqueOne pushes the boundaries creating a state-of-the art PSP and Crypto processing White Label iBanqueOne, a payment services company with a presence in Bahrain and UAE, has created a new version of a Banking-as-a-service type product, to provide other payment and crypto processing companies with a ready made business solution. Be Your Own Bank - Offer Payment and Crypto Services to OthersTransform your business instantly and offer banking-like services to your clientsHundreds of payment servicesMultiple crypto currency wallets and instant conversionsAutomate with a developer friendly API to enable payment, activation and loading transactionsIssue prepaid ATM debit cards loadable by bank transfers and crypto currenciesComplete Payments and Crypto Processing System for your businessPaymentsBanking and local payments solution. Create online accounts to send and receive multiple fiat and crypto currencies.CryptoUnlimited, automatic wallets and crypto conversion service. Generate wallets instantly, offer conversions between crypto and fiat. CardsIssue generic or co-branded ATM debit cards for your clients. Offer plastic or virtual cards to be used for payroll, commissions or payouts. Issue individual IBAN accounts with the debit cards.“With this easy and affordable solution, we hope to assist many start-ups and existing MSB and crypto companies that want to penetrate the growing market with their services”, says the Managing Director of the company, Mr. S. Premalal
